verbLexeme: 1. Of a substance, to be hard and firm and to remain the same shape whether it is in a container or not. English = (be) solid.
2. Of a substance, to feel very firm when you touch it and not to be easily bent, cut, or broken. English = (be) hard, (be) rigid, (be) firm.
nominalLexeme: 1. A substance which is hard and firm and remains the same shape whether it is in a container or not. English = solid.
